TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to District of Bravo settlers, 01-01-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Proclamation by Austin creating district of Bravo, January 1, 1825. Changing Brazos district to Bravo. Election return.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Proclamation by Austin creating district of Bravo, January 1, 1825. Chang- ing Brazos district to Bravo. Election return.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Judge*/person_mentioned* Commissioned for the *location_mentioned*Colony of the Brazos and Colorado*/location_mentioned* in the *location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned*—Charged by the *person_mentioned*Superior Authorities*/person_mentioned* with the*person_mentioned* Municipal Government*/person_mentioned* of this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* provisionally and [until] it is otherwise regulated, and it appearing to be the wish of the *person_mentioned*settlers*/person_mentioned* in that part of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* heretofore called the *location_mentioned*District of the Brazos*/location_mentioned*—that the name of said *location_mentioned*district*/location_mentioned* should be changed to that of *location_mentioned*Bravo */location_mentioned*after the distinguished hero and Republican Patriot,*person_mentioned* Genl Nicolas Bravo the Vice President*/person_mentioned* of these *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned*, Therefor I have thought proper to order and by these presents do order that the said *location_mentioned*District*/location_mentioned* heretofore called *location_mentioned*Brazos*/location_mentioned* shall in future be called the *location_mentioned*District of Bravo*/location_mentioned*, and shall keep the said name of *location_mentioned*Bravo*/location_mentioned* until the superior Govt, direct otherwise*/p* *p*Given etc *date_mentioned n="01-01-1825">January 1- 1825 */date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Judge*/person_mentioned* Commissioned for the *location_mentioned*Colony on the Brazos and Colorado rivers*/location_mentioned* in the *location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I certify that at an election held at the house of *person_mentioned*Andrew Robinson*/person_mentioned* by the inhabitants of the *location_mentioned*district of Bravo*/location_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="01-01-1825">1 day of January*/date_mentioned* of this year for an *person_mentioned*alcalde*/person_mentioned* for said *location_mentioned*District*/location_mentioned* for the year *date_mentioned n="01-01-1825">one thousand Eight hundred and twenty five*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*John P. Coles */person_mentioned*was duly elected *person_mentioned*Alcalde*/person_mentioned* of said *location_mentioned*district */location_mentioned*and that he may be respected and obeyed accordingly I give him this document */p* *p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="01-05-1825">January 5,1825*/date_mentioned* */p* *p*This day personally appeared before me *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Judge*/person_mentioned* commissioned for the *location_mentioned*Colony on the Colorado and Brasos */location_mentioned*the above *person_mentioned*John P. Coles Alcalde*/person_mentioned* elected for the *location_mentioned*district of Bravo */location_mentioned*for the year *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825*/date_mentioned* and took the oath to support the Constitution of the *location_mentioned*United States of Mexico*/location_mentioned* and of the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned* and faithfully and impartially to execute the duties of *person_mentioned*Alcalde*/person_mentioned* for said *location_mentioned*district of Bravo*/location_mentioned* for the year *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">one thousand eight hundred twenty five */date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
